analysis.description:
Crowdsale.minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#228) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- isMinimumGoalReached (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#552-553)

Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#259) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- investWithCustomerId (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#417-426)
	- invest (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#427-440)
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#493-497)

Crowdsale.signerAddress (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#262) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#493-497)

MultiVault.fetchTokenBalance (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#1000-1011) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- initialTokenBalance == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol:
	Contract MultiVault has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in MultiVault.fetchTokenBalance (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#1000-1011):
	External calls:
	- initialTokenBalance = getToken().balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#1002-1004)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- initialTokenBalanceFetched (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#1009)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#462-477):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#474)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#475-477)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#358-414):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#366-380)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#380-383)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#398-401)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#398)

MultiVault.claim (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#1016-1028) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-getToken().transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol)
SafeMathLib.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#30-41) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#724-728) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#305-347):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#327-332)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#344)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#334)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#343)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#358-414):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#366-380)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#380-383)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#389-394)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#388)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#394-397)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#562-592) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#578-591)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#572-591)

Crowdsale.minimumFundingGoal should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#228)
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#259)
Crowdsale.signerAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#262)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#172)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x35afb92d3f2be0d206e808355ca7bfac9d820735.sol#198)

	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
